page.title: 08CENTRAL PERTH REDEVELOPMENT
page.content: {REACTIONS OF PERTH PEOPLE The reactions amongst Perth people are mixed:many think the centre is a good idea,and that Perth needs something like this to attract more shoppers.When the plans were passed Perth & Kinross District Councillor, Roy McLean,said he was "Delighted." However,others feel it will ruin the character of the town,Perth being one of the few major towns not to have a shopping mall.A strong protest came from Perth Civic Trust,which said that the historic line of Meal Vennel would be lost.They have spent Â£3000 fighting the first public enquiry. Perth shop owner,Colin Stuart,has been a bitter critic of the scheme as it would badly affect peripheral shops in the city: "As far as I'm concerned the people of Perth don't want a mall." ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
